name: Strapi Headless CMS
description: Strapi is an open-source headless CMS that gives developers freedom while allowing editors to manage and distribute content across any platform. Perfect for building APIs, mobile apps, and multi-channel content delivery with Node.js.
short_desc: Headless CMS for modern developers and content creators.
author: Strapi Solutions SAS

form_fields.label: JWT Secret
form_fields.hint: Secret used to sign JWT for Users-Permissions plugin

form_fields.label: Admin JWT Secret
form_fields.hint: Secret used to sign JWT for Admin panel

form_fields.label: App Keys
form_fields.hint: Secret keys used to sign session cookies (comma-separated)
